issue.title: Val can't stand up after update

content.raw: I know this is an oldie, but a goodie.  This fundamental issue - Val falling down at the start - still persists across all our systems.  It's a nuisance; perhaps 20% of the time, but quite measurable.  With the new harness logic, it now looks like Val is just slumping on the job, instead of sprawling on the floor, but the root cause is presumably the same.  I do notice that if I have another process chewing cpu in the system when the sim starts, that seems to help trigger the failure.  (But that's not a requirement).
